Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hey guys, I put up two versions of this. One with fairings and one stock. The one with fairings uses the procedural fairing mod. http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/procedural-fairings/

w/fairings: http://d.pr/f/TzrK

Stock: http://d.pr/f/NM2l

Tried to get it as close to the actual version and still be functional. This one is set up for a munar mission, but it should be able to lift ~8-10 tons or so into low orbit. Or put a bunch of satellites into keostationary.
Not bad I say. I like how you've angled those nosecones to make it looks more Proton-ish

I was looking at this thinking: ok, run of the mill mun mission. Why is this amazing?

Then I saw the lander, hahah nice work!
